content: विस्फुर् {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To quiver, palpitate, tremble. {@--2@} To move about, struggle. {@--3@} To shine, gleam; किं नाम विस्फुरति शस्त्राणि <ls>U. 4.</ls> {@--4@} To draw or twang (as a bow, used in {%<ab>caus.</ab>%} in the same sense); एकोऽपि विस्फुरितमंडलचापचक्रं कः सिंधुराजमभिषेणयितुं समर्थः <ls>Ve. 2. 25.</ls>
